title: Raymundo Wants Bobby To Pay Him To Travel and Cover An Event + Bobby Feud: American’s Favorite Halloween Candy + How Your Kids Embarrass You In Public?
itunes:title: Raymundo Wants Bobby To Pay Him To Travel and Cover An Event + Bobby Feud: American’s Favorite Halloween Candy + How Your Kids Embarrass You In Public?
description:
Raymundo pitches an idea to Bobby. He says he was invited to an event in New York City and wants to get a paid trip to cover the event. Can you name the favorite Halloween candy according to Americans? In the mailbag, Bobby helps a listener with a situation involving a Morgan Wallen Concert. She was gifted tickets to go but can’t bring her husband because he’s recovering from COVID. Should she go without him even though it’s his favorite artist too?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
